trans-unit.source: A class used to receive a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> or a message contract type within a workflow service.
trans-unit.target: 類別，用來接收<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>或訊息合約中的工作流程服務型別。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveMessageContent"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveMessageContent"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveMessageContent"></xref> class with the specified message.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveMessageContent"></xref>類別具有指定的訊息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveMessageContent"></xref> class with the specified message and message type.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveMessageContent"></xref>與指定的訊息和訊息類型的類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the declared message type.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定宣告的訊息類型。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the message received.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定收到的訊息。

trans-unit.source: Gets a boolean value that determines if the message should be serialized as the declared message type.
trans-unit.target: 取得布林值，決定是否應該將訊息序列化為宣告的訊息類型。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message should be serialized as the declared message type; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果應序列化訊息做為宣告的訊息類型。否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
